cachingSystem.classes

Class ObservableCache<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cachingSystem.classes.ObservableCache<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key type
    V - the value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache<K,V>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LRUCache, ObservableFIFOCache

    public abstract class ObservableCache<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cache<K,V>
    Abstract class that adds support for listeners and stale element policies to the Cache interface.
